entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
